post.text: I've said it over and over again. Crooked Hillary is bought and paid for by The Establishmentâ€”BIG TIME! Unbelievably CORRUPT! I'm not and never will be owned by ANYONE! #TrumpIsWithYou #TrumpPence2016

comment.author: Carolyn
comment.text: "Let's make America great again"!!! Right, like Trump did in Atlantic City NJ, where he practiced eminent domain to take away family homes, promised to give the community a face lift only to ignore his promise it let it spiral even further downward and ran away with all the money he made off the backs of all the working class people he did not pay for their services! Trump is a liar, a cheat and a snake oil salesman! The United States of America is already the greatest Country on earth and if you don't feel that way... Get the hell out and see where that gets you!

replies.author: Carolyn
replies.text: Jessica Well that's really Christian of you to laugh at those who have been taken advantage of by someone who has no faith and no moral compass!

replies.author: Quentin
replies.text: Go Trump win over Crooked Hillary Clinton!!

replies.author: Austin
replies.text: Carolyn is not even a real person
